featured.text: 33 Paper lanterns and offerings are sent floating down rivers to accompany the ancestors back to their resting place.

definition.zh_def: 休息，放鬆或暫時停止活動的狀態。
definition.en_def: The state of being inactive or at ease, typically to recover energy.
definition.example: After a long day at work, she enjoyed resting on the couch.
